item.title: Example Talk
item.description:
Click on the Slides button above to view the built-in slides feature.

Slides can be added in a few ways:

  • Create slides using Academic’s Slides feature and link using slides parameter in the front matter of the talk file
  • Upload an existing slide deck to static/ and link using url_slides parameter in the front matter of the talk file
  • Embed your slides (e.g. Google Slides) or presentation video on this page using shortcodes.

Further talk details can easily be added to this page using Markdown and $\rm \LaTeX$ math code.

item.title: PEAI - Indeed an Effective Synergistic Modification Material to Improve All Perovskite Tandem Solar Cell Efficiency to Nearly 27%
Enhanced Electron Transport in Heterojunction Sn-Perovskite Solar Cells Assisted by [6,6]-Phenyl-C61-butyric Acid Methyl Ester as a Dopant
item.description: Click the Cite button above to easily export your references in a format suitable for your reference.

item.title: Origin中误差图的画法-从数据到图片的处理
item.description:
首先需要明确的是，我们在数据中所使用的误差线数值应该如何获得。

目前在数据处理中，国际上尚未统一采用哪一种误差，但是通过谷歌学术初步检索发现，2013年的SCI论文中明确给出误差棒的类型的，其中用平均数±标准误差（S.E.），仅有90条，而用平均数±标准方差（S.D.）约有331条，而对于爱斯维尔系统里的文章，我从我之前看到的论文中统计的结果是有标注误差棒且明确计算方法的，几乎都是用以上两种形式，而每4篇中就有三篇采用的是平均数±标准方差，因此我们在数据处理中的误差线都用平均数±标准方差来获得。

Origin如何取平均值和标准差

1、将数据导入。（说明，此处为在条件1下，对同一样品测试4次后得到的数据）

2、选取需要进行求平均值以及标准差的重复实验数据，选中之后右击Statistics on Row，选择Open Dialog…，弹出如图的对话框，直接点击OK，就可以在表格中直接得到平均值和标准差数据。（切记，选择时不能选择X轴数据）

3.误差棒画法参数设置：

即可得到下图：

数据

序号 数据1 数据2 数据3 数据4 数据5 数据6 数据7 数据8
1 2 1 2.1 2.2 1.9 1.84 0.4827
2 4.1 4.05 3 4.2 3.8 3.83 0.48683
3 7.2 6 7 7.3 6.99 6.898 0.51915
4 13.5 12 13.65 13.57 13.8 13.304 0.73745
5 17.3 17.2 14 16.89 17 16.478 1.3946
6 20.1 20.15 19.89 18 20 19.628 0.91552
7 24.9 25.3 28 25 25.1 25.66 1.31643
8 30.1 31 30.9 30.12 30.14 30.452 0.4562
9 35 34.9 38 35.3 35.2 35.68 1.30652
10 40.2 35 39.8 40.14 40 39.028 2.25697

item.title: python
item.description:
• Python绘图
  • 使用Python绘图的尺寸规定和不同类型的代码解释
    • 单图的绘制
      • 折线图的绘制
      • 点线图的绘制
      • 柱状图的绘制
      • 箱图的制备
      • ln，log图的绘制
    • 双图的制作
      • 方法1：使用循环命令定义多组数据的文件
      • 方法2：逐个定义数据
    • 三图的绘制
    • 四图的绘制
    • 六图的绘制
    • 总结
  • PSCs论文中常用的图片的代码和显示
    • PSCs的各个参数统计图
    • TRPL的数据拟合
    • 暗态光电流显示
    • IV曲线的绘制
    • IPCE的绘制
      • 没有积分电流
      • 有积分电流的双Y轴绘制
    • 长期稳定性绘制
    • UV算的带隙数据以及切线的绘制
    • XRD 数据
    • UV 数据
    • TPC 数据
    • TPV 数据
    • TRPL mapping数据
    • SCLC数据
    • MS 图绘制
    • PL 数据

Python绘图

本文将对python的绘图进行规定，包括图片尺寸，常用命令以及部分数据拟合（包括PL寿命，切线等等命令）。

使用Python绘图的尺寸规定和不同类型的代码解释

单图的绘制

折线图的绘制

本节将展示单个图片展示的代码。以PL数据为例

import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

# 读取文件数据
data = np.loadtxt("PLcharge.txt")

# 分割数据
x1_data = data[:, 0]  # 第一列作为X轴数值
x2_data = data[:, 2]  # 第三列作为X轴数值
x3_data = data[:, 4]  # 第五列作为X轴数值
x4_data = data[:, 6]  # 第七列作为X轴数值

y1_data = data[:, 1]  # 第二列作为Y轴数值
y2_data = data[:, 3]  # 第四列作为Y轴数值
y3_data = data[:, 5]  # 第六列作为Y轴数值
y4_data = data[:, 7]  # 第八列作为Y轴数值

fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(4,3.5),dpi=300,facecolor="w",constrained_layout=True) #constrained_layout=True:让图片紧凑
#4cm为10.16cm

# 设置Y轴使用科学计数法
ax.ticklabel_format(style='sci', axis='y', scilimits=(0, 0))

# 设置X轴显示范围
ax.set_xlim(600, 900)  # 修改此处为ax.set_xlim

# 绘制折线图
ax.plot(x1_data, y1_data, label='glass/PVK', color='m', alpha=0.5)
ax.plot(x2_data, y2_data, label='ITO/NiOx/PVK', color='c', alpha=0.5)
ax.plot(x3_data, y3_data, label='ITO/NiOx/PEAI/PVK/C60', color='r', alpha=0.5)
ax.plot(x4_data, y4_data, label='ITO/NiOx/PEAI/PVK/PEAI/C60', color='g', alpha=0.5)

# 设置坐标的名称和字体
plt.xlabel('Wavelength (nm)') #, fontsize=12
plt.ylabel('Intensity (a.u.)')

# 设置坐标轴的大小
#ax.tick_params(axis='x', labelsize=12)
#ax.tick_params(axis='y', labelsize=12)

# 绘制图例不带窗户阴影，并且设置字体
ax.legend(frameon=False, fontsize=8)

# 绘制图
#plt.tight_layout()  让图片紧凑的另一个方式

#plt.savefig("Figure_1.png", transparent=True) 保存成透明图片，用于海报制作可以考虑

plt.show()

Result:

点线图的绘制

import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from matplotlib.gridspec import GridSpec #把子图网格化

fig=plt.figure(figsize=(4,3.5),dpi=300,facecolor="w",constrained_layout=True) 
gs=GridSpec(1,1)
msc=plt.subplot(gs[0,0]) 

MSC=np.loadtxt('./MSC.txt')
MST=np.loadtxt('./MST.txt')
xms1 = MSC[:,0]
yms1 = MSC[:,1]
xms2 = MST[:,0]
yms2 = MST[:,1]

msc.plot(xms1,yms1, 'o-',ms=4,label=r'control',color='C9',linewidth=1)
msc.plot(xms2,yms2, 'o-',ms=4,label=r'target', color='C6',linewidth=1)

msc.set_xlabel(r'Voltage (V)')
msc.set_ylabel(r'Mott-Schottky ($1/F^{2}$)')
msc.set_xlim([0,1.2])
msc.set_ylim([0,0.7e16])

msc.text(0.408,3e+15, r"0.96 V", color='C9') 
msc.text(0.825,5.48e+15, r"1.06 V", color='C6') 

msc.legend(frameon=False)
fig.tight_layout()
plt.show()

Result:

柱状图的绘制

import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from matplotlib.gridspec import GridSpec #把子图网格化

fig=plt.figure(figsize=(4,3.5),dpi=300,facecolor="w",constrained_layout=True) 
gs=GridSpec(1,1)

sub1=plt.subplot(gs[0,0]) #组图的个数和位置

species = ("Control", "Bottom","Both")  #定义柱状图的数据，这里提供直接输入，至于从文件读取，之后会摸索
penguin_means = {
    'jsc': (0.07684,0.10273,0.11164),   
    'vocrad': (0.00622,0.00804,0.00605),
    'voc': (0.12358,0.13022,0.13528),
    'ff0': (0.06774,0.04302,0.02952),
    'FF': (0.16714,0.11304,0.08216),
}    #这里只是简单的给出一个区分而已

x = np.arange(len(species))  # the label locations
width = 0.15  # 柱子与柱子之间的距离
multiplier = 0

sub1.plot()

for attribute, measurement in penguin_means.items():
    offset = width * multiplier
    if attribute == 'jsc':
        color = 'c'
    elif attribute == 'vocrad':
        color = 'r'
    elif attribute == 'voc':
        color = 'g'
    elif attribute == 'ff0':
        color = 'y'
    elif attribute == 'FF':
        color = 'b'
#offset = width * multiplier：这一行计算一个名为 offset 的变量，它用于确定每个柱的
# 水平位置偏移量。width 是之前定义的柱的宽度，而 multiplier 是一个可能用于自定义某些柱
# 高度的值。offset 用于将每个柱的水平位置调整。
        
    rects = sub1.bar(x + offset, measurement, width, label=attribute, color=color,alpha=0.5,edgecolor='k',hatch='.')
    sub1.bar_label(rects, fontsize=5,padding=2) #padding 数值和柱子之间的距离 fontsize 在柱子上显示数值并规定大小
    multiplier += 1

# 添加图例，y轴等相关信息
sub1.set_ylabel('Percentage of DB efficiency')
sub1.set_xticks(x + width, species)
sub1.legend([r'$\frac{J\mathrm{_{SC}} }{J\mathrm{_{SC}^{DB}}  } $',r'$\frac{V\mathrm{_{OC}^{rad}} }{V\mathrm{_{OC}^{DB}}  } $',
             r'$\frac{V\mathrm{_{OC}} }{V\mathrm{_{OC}^{rad}}  } $',r'$\frac{FF\mathrm{_{0}} V\mathrm{_{OC}} }{FF\mathrm{^{DB}}  } $',r'$\frac{FF}{FF\mathrm{_{0}} V\mathrm{_{OC}} } $'],loc='upper right', ncols=2.5,frameon=False) #图注无背景,添加图注文字，图注的位置等等
#这里定义了一种有下标的书写方式以及分数的书写方式
sub1.set_ylim(0,0.35)

fig.tight_layout()
plt.show()

Result:

import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from matplotlib.gridspec import GridSpec #把子图网格化
from matplotlib.ticker import ScalarFormatter, MultipleLocator #定义轴是否使用科学计数法，定义坐标间距

fig=plt.figure(figsize=(4,3.5),dpi=300,facecolor="w",constrained_layout=True) 
gs=GridSpec(1,1)
voc=plt.subplot(gs[0,0]) 
#-----------VOC-Light
VLR=np.loadtxt('./VOClightraw.txt')
VLF=np.loadtxt('./VOClightfit.txt')
xvlrc = VLR[:,0]
yvlrc = VLR[:,1]
xvlrt = VLR[:,0]
yvlrt = VLR[:,2]
xvlfc = VLF[:,0]
yvlfc = VLF[:,1]
xvlft = VLF[:,2]
yvlft = VLF[:,3]

voc.plot(xvlrc,yvlrc, 'o',ms=5,label=r'control', color='C9')
voc.plot(xvlrt,yvlrt, 'o',ms=5,label=r'target', color='C6')
voc.plot(xvlfc,yvlfc, '-.', color='C9',linewidth=1) #,label=r'control'
voc.plot(xvlft,yvlft, '-.', color='C6',linewidth=1) #,label=r'target'

voc.set_xlabel(r'Light intensity (mW/cm$^{2}$)')
voc.set_ylabel(r'$V$$\mathrm{_{OC}}$ (V)')
voc.set_xscale('symlog') #x轴以ln 对数形式 形式显示 voc.set_xscale('log')
voc.set_xticks(xvlrc)
#voc.set_xticks(xvlrc)：这行代码设置X轴的刻度位置为 
# xvlrc，xvlrc 是一个包含刻度位置的列表或数组，用于自定义X轴的刻度位置
voc.xaxis.set_major_formatter(ScalarFormatter()) 
#设置X轴不使用科学计数法，这行代码设置X轴的主要刻
# 度标签格式化器为ScalarFormatter，这将使用标准的数字格式来显示刻度标签。
voc.yaxis.set_major_locator(MultipleLocator(0.02))
#这将使Y轴的主要刻度线每隔0.02个单位显示一个。

voc.text(20.59,1.12, r"1.16 $KT/q$",color='C6',) 
voc.text(21.1,1.0731, r"1.74 $KT/q$",color='C9',) 

voc.legend(frameon=False)

fig.tight_layout()
plt.show()

双图的制作

本节将展示单个图片展示的代码。以EIS数据为例

方法1：使用循环命令定义多组数据的文件

import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from matplotlib.gridspec import GridSpec #把子图网格化

fig=plt.figure(figsize=(7.24,3.5),dpi=200,facecolor="w",constrained_layout=True) 
gs=GridSpec(1,2)

sub1=plt.subplot(gs[0,0]) 
sub2=plt.subplot(gs[0,1]) 
#----------------------------------------EIS
# 读取数据文件
data = np.loadtxt("EIS_raw.txt")
data1 = np.loadtxt("EIS_fit.txt")

# 定义X和Y数据
x_data = data[:, [0, 2, 4]]  # 第一列，第三列，第五列
y_data = data[:, [1, 3, 5]]  # 第二列，第四列，第六列

x_data1 = data1[:, [0, 2, 4]]  # 第一列，第三列，第五列
y_data1 = data1[:, [1, 3, 5]]  # 第二列，第四列，第六列

# 颜色和标签
colors = ['c', 'r', 'g']
labels = ['../PVK/..', '../PEAI/PVK/..', '../PEAI/PVK/PEAI/..']

colors2 = ['magenta', 'lightgreen', 'orange']

# 循环绘制每列数据
for i in range(x_data.shape[1]):
    x = x_data[:, i]
    y = y_data[:, i]

    # 绘制点图
    sub1.scatter(x, y, label=labels[i], color=colors[i],alpha=0.5)

for k in range(x_data1.shape[1]):
    x1 = x_data1[:, k]
    y1 = y_data1[:, k]

    # 绘制点图
    sub1.plot(x1, y1, color=colors2[k],alpha=0.5)

# 设置X轴和Y轴的坐标范围
sub1.set_xlim(0, 700)
sub1.set_ylim(0, 400)
sub1.tick_params(axis='x', ) #labelsize=12
sub1.tick_params(axis='y',)

# 显示图例和设置标题
sub1.set_xlabel('Z` ($\Omega $)',) # fontsize=12
sub1.set_ylabel('-Z`` ($\Omega $)', )
sub1.legend(frameon=False)
#---------------------------------------------fitting
# 定义X和Y数据
x = [0,0.22,0.44,0.66,0.88,1.1]
y1 = [210.4,95.2,79.6,62.5,57.2,52.3]
y2 = [587.4,425.2,313.2,200.5,182.5,172.1]
y3 = [820.4,620.5,570.2,398.2,350.1,342.5]

# 绘制点图
sub2.plot(x, y1, marker='o', linestyle='--', color='c', alpha=0.5,label='../PVK/..')
sub2.plot(x, y2, marker='^', linestyle='-.', color='r',alpha=0.5, label='../PEAI/PVK/..')
sub2.plot(x, y3, marker='D',linestyle=':', color='g', alpha=0.5,label='../PEAI/PVK/PEAI/..')

# 设置X轴和Y轴的坐标范围
sub2.set_xlim(-0.1, 1.2)
#sub2.set_ylim(0, 400)
sub2.tick_params(axis='x', ) #labelsize=12
sub2.tick_params(axis='y',)

# 显示图例和设置标题
sub2.set_xlabel('Voltage (V)',) # fontsize=12
sub2.set_ylabel('$R\mathrm{_{rec}} (Ω)$' )
sub2.legend(frameon=False)

fig.tight_layout()
# 显示图形
plt.show()

import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from matplotlib.gridspec import GridSpec #把子图网格化


fig=plt.figure(figsize=(7.24,6),dpi=200,facecolor="w",constrained_layout=True) 
gs=GridSpec(2,2)

sub1=plt.subplot(gs[0,0])  #组图的个数和位置
sub2=plt.subplot(gs[0,1])  #组图的个数和位置
sub3=plt.subplot(gs[1,0])  #组图的个数和位置
sub4=plt.subplot(gs[1,1])  #组图的个数和位置 

#-------------PCE
PCE=np.loadtxt('./PCE.txt')

v1 = PCE[:,0]
j1 = PCE[:,1]
v2 = PCE[:,2]
j2 = PCE[:,3]
v3 = PCE[:,4]
j3 = PCE[:,5]

sub1.set_xlim([0,1.23])
sub1.set_ylim([0,18])

sub1.plot(v3,j3,label=r'../PVK/..', linestyle='-.',linewidth=2,color='c',alpha=0.5)
sub1.plot(v2,j2,label=r'../PEAI/PVK/..', linestyle='--',linewidth=2,color='r',alpha=0.5)
sub1.plot(v1,j1,label=r'../PEAI/PVK/PEAI/..', linestyle='-',linewidth=2,color='g',alpha=0.5)

sub1.set_xlabel(r'Voltage (V)')
sub1.set_ylabel(r'Current density (mA/cm$^{2}$)')

sub1.legend(frameon=False)
#--------IPEC
IPCE=np.loadtxt('./IPCE.txt')
W1 = IPCE[:,0]
I1 = IPCE[:,1]
I2 = IPCE[:,2]
I3 = IPCE[:,3]

sub2.set_xlim([300,800])
sub2.set_ylim([0,1])

sub2.plot(W1,I1,label=r'../PVK/..', linestyle='-.',linewidth=2,color='c',alpha=0.5)
sub2.plot(W1,I3,label=r'../PEAI/PVK/..', linestyle='--',linewidth=2,color='r',alpha=0.5)
sub2.plot(W1,I2,label=r'../PEAI/PVK/PEAI/..', linestyle='-',linewidth=2,color='g',alpha=0.5)

sub2.fill_between(W1,I1,I2,color='tab:orange',alpha=0.32) #两条线之间填充颜色
sub2.fill_between(W1,I2,I3,color='green',alpha=0.32) #两条线之间填充颜色

sub2.set_xlabel(r'Wavelength (nm)')
sub2.set_ylabel(r'IPCE')

sub2.legend(frameon=False)
#-----------N2
N2=np.loadtxt('./N2.txt')
T1 = N2[:,0]
P1 = N2[:,1]
P2 = N2[:,2]
P3 = N2[:,3]

sub3.set_xlim([-100,2100])
sub3.set_ylim([0,110])

sub3.plot(T1,P1,label=r'../PVK/..', linestyle='-',linewidth=2,color='c',marker='o',markersize=4,alpha=0.5)
sub3.plot(T1,P2,label=r'../PEAI/PVK/..', linestyle='-',linewidth=2,color='r',marker='^',markersize=4,alpha=0.5)
sub3.plot(T1,P3,label=r'../PEAI/PVK/PEAI/..', linestyle='-',linewidth=2,color='g',marker='p',markersize=4,alpha=0.5)

sub3.set_xlabel(r'Time (h)')
sub3.set_ylabel(r'Norm. PCE (%)')

sub3.text(1900,10,r'N$_{2}$')

sub3.legend(frameon=False)
#-----------hot stability
H=np.loadtxt('./hot.txt')
Ti1 = H[:,0]
Pc1 = H[:,1]
Pc2 = H[:,2]
Pc3 = H[:,3]

sub4.set_xlim([-10,510])

sub4.plot(Ti1,Pc2,label=r'../PEAI/PVK/..', linestyle='-',linewidth=2,color='r',marker='^',markersize=4,alpha=0.5)
sub4.plot(Ti1,Pc3,label=r'../PEAI/PVK/PEAI/..', linestyle='-',linewidth=2,color='g',marker='p',markersize=4,alpha=0.5)


sub4.set_xlabel(r'Time (h)')
sub4.set_ylabel(r'Norm. PCE (%)')

#sub4.legend(shadow=True, fancybox=True) #图例窗口会有阴影

TRPL的数据拟合

本代码可以在拟合寿命的同时，在面板上给出荧光的各个数据.可以根据自己的需求，去更改定义的函数

import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from scipy.optimize import curve_fit

# 定义一个双指数衰减函数 (ExpDec2)
def exp_dec2(x, A1, tau1, A2, tau2):
    return A1 * np.exp(-x / tau1) + A2 * np.exp(-x / tau2)

# 读取数据文件
data = np.loadtxt("TRPL.txt")

# 定义X和Y数据
x_data = data[:, [0, 2, 4]]  # 第一列，第三列，第五列
y_data = data[:, [1, 3, 5]]  # 第二列，第四列，第六列

# 创建一个图形窗口
plt.figure() #figsize=(10, 6)

# 初始化参数列表
params_list = []

# 颜色和标签
colors = ['c', 'r', 'g']
labels = ['NiO$x$/PVK', 'NiO$x$/PEAI/PVK/C60', 'NiO$x$/PEAI/PVK/PEAI/C60']

colors2 = ['magenta', 'lightgreen', 'orange']

# 循环拟合和绘制每列数据
for i in range(x_data.shape[1]):
    x = x_data[:, i]
    y = y_data[:, i]

    # 使用curve_fit进行拟合
    params, covariance = curve_fit(exp_dec2, x, y, p0=[1.0, 1.0, 0.5, 0.2])
    A1_fit, tau1_fit, A2_fit, tau2_fit = params

    # 计算平均荧光寿命
    average_lifetime = (A1_fit * tau1_fit * tau1_fit + A2_fit * tau2_fit * tau2_fit) / (A1_fit * tau1_fit + A2_fit * tau2_fit)

    # 绘制原始数据和拟合曲线
    plt.semilogy(x, y, label=labels[i], color=colors[i],alpha=0.5)
    plt.semilogy(x, exp_dec2(x, A1_fit, tau1_fit, A2_fit, tau2_fit), color=colors2[i], linestyle='--')

    # 将拟合参数以文本形式显示在图中
 #   fit_info = f"Data {i + 1}:\nA1: {A1_fit:.2f}, tau1: {tau1_fit:.2f}\nA2: {A2_fit:.2f}, tau2: {tau2_fit:.2f}\nAverage Lifetime: {average_lifetime:.2f}"
 #   plt.text(2.0, 0.05, fit_info, fontsize=10, verticalalignment='top')

    # 将参数添加到参数列表
    params_list.append(params)

# 设置X轴的显示范围
plt.xlim(0, 100)
plt.ylim(0.01, 1)

# 显示图例和设置标题
plt.xlabel('Time (ns)',fontsize=12)
plt.ylabel('Intensity (a.u.)',fontsize=12)
plt.legend(frameon=False,fontsize=10)

plt.tick_params(axis='x', labelsize=12)
plt.tick_params(axis='y', labelsize=12)

plt.text(1, 0.020, r"$\tau$$\mathrm{_{control/avg.}}$ = 38.77 ns ", fontsize=10, color='c',alpha=0.5)
plt.text(1, 0.015, r"$\tau$$\mathrm{_{bottom/avg.}}$ = 27.04 ns ", fontsize=10, color='r',alpha=0.5)
plt.text(1, 0.011, r"$\tau$$\mathrm{_{both/avg.}}$ = 16.72 ns ", fontsize=10, color='g',alpha=0.5)

plt.tight_layout()

# 显示图形
plt.show()

# 打印拟合参数和平均荧光寿命
for i, params in enumerate(params_list):
    A1_fit, tau1_fit, A2_fit, tau2_fit = params
    average_lifetime = (A1_fit * tau1_fit * tau1_fit + A2_fit * tau2_fit * tau2_fit) / (A1_fit * tau1_fit + A2_fit * tau2_fit)
    print(f"Data {i + 1} - Fitted Parameters:")
    print(f"A1: {A1_fit}, tau1: {tau1_fit}, A2: {A2_fit}, tau2: {tau2_fit}")
    print(f"Average Lifetime: {average_lifetime}")

UV算的带隙数据以及切线的绘制

from pickle import FALSE
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

# 读取文件数据
data = np.loadtxt("bandgap.txt")

# 分割数据为X和Y列
x_data = data[:, 0]
y_data = data[:, 1]
y_data1 = data[:, 2]
y_data2 = data[:, 3]
# 定义需要绘制切线的X轴范围
x_min = 1.52334
x_max = 1.8
#-------------------------------------------control
# 找到最接近1.54613的数据点
x_point = 1.55613
index = np.argmin(np.abs(x_data - x_point))
x_point = x_data[index]
y_point = y_data[index]

# 计算切线斜率，这里选择使用前后两个点进行线性拟合
x_before = x_data[index - 1]
y_before = y_data[index - 1]
x_after = x_data[index + 1]
y_after = y_data[index + 1]

slope = (y_after - y_before) / (x_after - x_before)

# 计算截距
intercept = y_point - slope * x_point

# 生成切线上的点
x_line = np.linspace(1.52, 1.57, 2)  # 指定横坐标范围
y_line = slope * x_line + intercept

#-------------------------------------------bottom
x_point = 1.5657
index = np.argmin(np.abs(x_data - x_point))
x_point1 = x_data[index]
y_point1 = y_data1[index]

# 计算切线斜率，这里选择使用前后两个点进行线性拟合
x_before1 = x_data[index - 1]
y_before1 = y_data2[index - 1]
x_after1 = x_data[index + 1]
y_after1 = y_data2[index + 1]

slope1 = (y_after1 - y_before1) / (x_after1 - x_before1)

# 计算截距
intercept1 = y_point1 - slope1 * x_point1

# 生成切线上的点
x_line1 = np.linspace(1.52, 1.57, 2)  # 指定横坐标范围
y_line1 = slope1 * x_line1 + intercept1

#-------------------------------------both
x_point = 1.5406
index = np.argmin(np.abs(x_data - x_point))
x_point2 = x_data[index]
y_point2 = y_data2[index]

# 计算切线斜率，这里选择使用前后两个点进行线性拟合
x_before2 = x_data[index - 1]
y_before2 = y_data2[index - 1]
x_after2 = x_data[index + 1]
y_after2 = y_data2[index + 1]

slope2 = (y_after2 - y_before2) / (x_after2 - x_before2)

# 计算截距
intercept2 = y_point2 - slope2 * x_point2

# 生成切线上的点
x_line2 = np.linspace(1.52, 1.57, 2)  # 指定横坐标范围
y_line2 = slope2 * x_line2 + intercept2

#---------------------------绘图
fig=plt.figure(figsize=(4,3.5),dpi=300,facecolor="w",constrained_layout=True)
# 绘制原始数据
plt.scatter(x_data, y_data, label='control', color='b',alpha=0.5)
plt.scatter(x_data, y_data1, label='bottom', color='g',alpha=0.5)
plt.scatter(x_data, y_data2, label='both', color='r',alpha=0.5)

# 绘制切线
plt.plot(x_line, y_line, label='Tangent Line-control', color='b')
plt.plot(x_line, y_line1, label='Tangent Line-bottom', color='g')
plt.plot(x_line, y_line2, label='Tangent Line-both', color='r')

plt.xlabel('Energy (eV)')
plt.ylabel(r'Ln($\alpha$)')
plt.legend(frameon=False)
plt.grid(True)

# 指定X轴显示范围
plt.xlim(x_min, x_max)

plt.tight_layout()

plt.show()

Result:

from matplotlib.gridspec import GridSpec #把子图网格化


fig=plt.figure(figsize=(4,3.5),dpi=300,facecolor="w",constrained_layout=True)

b1 = Xc[:,0]
i1 = Xc[:,1]

import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from matplotlib.gridspec import GridSpec #把子图网格化

fig=plt.figure(figsize=(4,3.5),dpi=300,facecolor="w",constrained_layout=True) 
gs=GridSpec(1,1)
sub1=plt.subplot(gs[0,0]) 

tpc = np.loadtxt("tpc.txt")
x_data = tpc[:, [0, 2, 4]]  # 第一列，第三列，第五列
y_data = tpc[:, [1, 3, 5]]  # 第二列，第四列，第六列

colors = ['c', 'r', 'g']
labels = ['../PVK/..', '../PEAI/PVK/..', '../PEAI/PVK/PEAI/..']

for k in range(x_data.shape[1]):
    x1 = x_data[:, k]
    y1 = y_data[:, k]

    # 绘制点图

sub1.set_xlim(0, 5)

# 显示图例和设置标题

TRPL mapping数据

import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from matplotlib.gridspec import GridSpec #把子图网格化

fig=plt.figure(figsize=(7.2,3.5),dpi=200) 
gs=GridSpec(1,2)

tc1=plt.subplot(gs[0,0]) 
tt1=plt.subplot(gs[0,1]) 

#--------REOL1
data = np.loadtxt('./TRPL_C_CT.txt')

# make data with uneven sampling in x
y = data[:,0]
X, Y = np.meshgrid(np.linspace(700,900, 41),y)
Z1 = data[:, 1:]

contour1 = tc1.contourf(X,Y,Z1/Z1.max(),  extend='both',cmap="rainbow",levels=np.arange(0,1,0.005))  #locator=ticker.LogLocator(), 图例以log形式显示

contour1.collections[0].set_edgecolor("face") #隐藏等高线

cbartt1 = plt.colorbar(contour1, ticks=np.arange(0, 1,0.1)) #ax=tc, 
cbartt1.mappable.set_clim(0,1)


tc1.set(xlim=(750,850), ylim=(0,30))

tc1.set_xlabel(r'Wavelength (nm)')
tc1.set_ylabel(r'Time (ns)')
#-----------tr
data1 = np.loadtxt('./TRPL_T_CT.txt')
y = data1[:,0]
X, Y = np.meshgrid(np.linspace(700,900, 41),y)
Z = data1[:, 1:]

contour = tt1.contourf(X,Y,Z/Z.max(),  extend='both',cmap="rainbow",levels=np.arange(0,1,0.005))  #locator=ticker.LogLocator(), 图例以log形式显示

contour.collections[0].set_edgecolor("face") #隐藏等高线

cbartt = plt.colorbar(contour, ticks=np.arange(0, 1, 0.1))
cbartt.mappable.set_clim(0, 1)  #设定颜色的范围 即0-80意思为颜色条..
 
tt1.set(xlim=(750,850), ylim=(0,30))

tt1.set_xlabel(r'Wavelength (nm)')
tt1.set_ylabel(r'Time (ns)')

fig.tight_layout()
plt.show()

Result:

注意，此图最好保存为png而不是svg，避免图像失真。

SCLC数据

import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from matplotlib.gridspec import GridSpec #把子图网格化

fig=plt.figure(figsize=(4,3.5),dpi=300,facecolor="w",constrained_layout=True) 
gs=GridSpec(1,1)

SCLC1=plt.subplot(gs[0,0]) 

#--------SCLC1
S1=np.loadtxt('./SCLC1.txt')
xvlrc = S1[::3,0]
yvlrc = S1[::3,1]


SCLC1.plot(xvlrc,yvlrc, 'o-',ms=5,label=r'control', color='C9')

SCLC1.set_xlabel(r'Voltage (V)')
SCLC1.set_ylabel(r'Current (A)')
SCLC1.set_xscale('log') #x轴以ln形式显示
SCLC1.set_yscale('log')
SCLC1.set_xticks([0.1, 0.5, 1.0]) #显示特定的数据

SCLC1.get_xaxis().set_major_formatter(plt.ScalarFormatter())

SCLC1.text(0.104,1.864E-6, r"$V$$_{TFL}$=0.66 eV") 
SCLC1.text(0.104,8.94E-7, r"$n_{t}=3.88×10^{15}$ cm$^{-3}$") 

SCLC1.legend(frameon=False)
plt.tight_layout() #保证出来的图是完整的，防止有时候X或者Y轴显示不全

plt.show()

MS 图绘制

import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from matplotlib.gridspec import GridSpec #把子图网格化

fig=plt.figure(figsize=(4,3.5),dpi=300,facecolor="w",constrained_layout=True) 
gs=GridSpec(1,1)
msc=plt.subplot(gs[0,0]) 

MSC=np.loadtxt('./MSC.txt')
MST=np.loadtxt('./MST.txt')
xms1 = MSC[:,0]
yms1 = MSC[:,1]
xms2 = MST[:,0]
yms2 = MST[:,1]

msc.plot(xms1,yms1, 'o-',ms=4,label=r'control',color='C9',linewidth=1)
msc.plot(xms2,yms2, 'o-',ms=4,label=r'target', color='C6',linewidth=1)

msc.set_xlabel(r'Voltage (V)')
msc.set_ylabel(r'Mott-Schottky ($1/F^{2}$)')
msc.set_xlim([0,1.2])
msc.set_ylim([0,0.7e16])

msc.text(0.408,3e+15, r"0.96 V", color='C9') 
msc.text(0.825,5.48e+15, r"1.06 V", color='C6') 

msc.legend(frameon=False)
fig.tight_layout()
plt.show()

ax.legend(frameon=False, fontsize=8)

# 绘制图

#plt.savefig("Figure_1.png", transparent=True) 保存成透明图片，用于海报制作可以考虑

item.title: Slides
item.description:
Create slides in Markdown with Academic

Academic | Documentation

Features

  • Efficiently write slides in Markdown
  • 3-in-1: Create, Present, and Publish your slides
  • Supports speaker notes
  • Mobile friendly slides

Controls

  • Next: Right Arrow or Space
  • Previous: Left Arrow
  • Start: Home
  • Finish: End
  • Overview: Esc
  • Speaker notes: S
  • Fullscreen: F
  • Zoom: Alt + Click
  • PDF Export: E

Code Highlighting

Inline code: variable

Code block:

porridge = "blueberry"
if porridge == "blueberry":
    print("Eating...")

Math

In-line math: $x + y = z$

Block math:

$$ f\left( x \right) = ;\frac{{2\left( {x + 4} \right)\left( {x - 4} \right)}}{{\left( {x + 4} \right)\left( {x + 1} \right)}} $$

Fragments

Make content appear incrementally

{{% fragment %}} One {{% /fragment %}}
{{% fragment %}} **Two** {{% /fragment %}}
{{% fragment %}} Three {{% /fragment %}}

Press Space to play!

One **Two** Three

A fragment can accept two optional parameters:

  • class: use a custom style (requires definition in custom CSS)
  • weight: sets the order in which a fragment appears

Speaker Notes

Add speaker notes to your presentation

{{% speaker_note %}}
- Only the speaker can read these notes
- Press `S` key to view
{{% /speaker_note %}}

Press the S key to view the speaker notes!

  • Only the speaker can read these notes
  • Press S key to view

Themes

  • black: Black background, white text, blue links (default)
  • white: White background, black text, blue links
  • league: Gray background, white text, blue links
  • beige: Beige background, dark text, brown links
  • sky: Blue background, thin dark text, blue links
  • night: Black background, thick white text, orange links
  • serif: Cappuccino background, gray text, brown links
  • simple: White background, black text, blue links
  • solarized: Cream-colored background, dark green text, blue links

Custom Slide

Customize the slide style and background

{{< slide background-image="/media/boards.jpg" >}}
{{< slide background-color="#0000FF" >}}
{{< slide class="my-style" >}}

Custom CSS Example

Let’s make headers navy colored.

Create assets/css/reveal_custom.css with:

.reveal section h1,
.reveal section h2,
.reveal section h3 {
  color: navy;
}

Questions?

Ask

Documentation
